query:
ALTER TABLE alert_rules 
ADD COLUMN metric_type VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN comparison_operator ENUM('less_than', 'greater_than', 'equals', 'not_equals') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'less_than',
ADD COLUMN threshold_value INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN consecutive_months INT DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN severity ENUM('info', 'warning', 'critical') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'warning',
ADD COLUMN notify_in_app BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
ADD COLUMN notify_email BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
ADD COLUMN condition_logic JSON,
ADD COLUMN created_by INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1;
command:

ADD COLUMN metric_type VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN comparison_operator ENUM('less_than', 'greater_than', 'equals', 'not_equals') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'less_than',
ADD COLUMN threshold_value INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN consecutive_months INT DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN severity ENUM('info', 'warning', 'critical') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'warning',
ADD COLUMN notify_in_app BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
ADD COLUMN notify_email BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
ADD COLUMN condition_logic JSON,
ADD COLUMN created_by INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1;
